title: API Error Troubleshooting
description: A developer is receiving a '500 Internal Server Error' when calling a specific API endpoint and needs help diagnosing the cause.

tasks.description: Get the customer's account ID, the full API request (endpoint, headers, body), and the approximate time of the error.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary details to investigate the API call.

tasks.description: Look up the API request logs using the customer's ID and timestamp to find the specific error trace.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the corresponding error log and stack trace.

tasks.description: Analyze the error trace, identify it as a known bug, and provide the customer with a link to the bug report and a suggested workaround.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly diagnoses the issue as a known bug and provides helpful information.
